body: "The cliche that truth is stranger than fiction is true": Active Voice interviews the author of Dog-Heart about parallels with the story of Christopher ‘Dog Paw’ Linton, who was recently arrested by Jamaican police.
original_body: "The cliche that truth is stranger than fiction is true": Active Voice interviews the author of Dog-Heart about parallels with the story of Christopher ‘Dog Paw’ Linton, who was recently arrested by Jamaican police.
title: Jamaica: "Dog-Paw"
